title: List of Paris Saint-Germain FC managers - Wikipedia
snippet: Paris Saint-Germain FC have had 32 managers, 18 of whom have won at least one trophy. Former Spanish player Luis Enrique is the current manager. He has been in charge since July 2023.

title: Luis Enrique - Wikipedia
snippet: Luis Enrique Martínez García (Spanish pronunciation: [lwis enˈrike maɾˈtineθ ɡaɾˈθia]; born 8 May 1970), known as Luis Enrique, is a Spanish football manager and former player. He is currently the head coach of Ligue 1 club Paris Saint-Germain. A versatile player with good technique, ...

title: PSG plan to offer lifetime contract for Luis Enrique - reports - Football | Tribuna.com
snippet: Today, 22 December 2025, 10:50 · Luis Enrique / Getty Images · According to Diario AS, PSG are ready to offer Luis Enrique a lifetime contract, with his current deal expiring in June 2027.

title: Luis Enrique: The manager behind PSG’s run to UEFA Champions League final | Football News | Al Jazeera
snippet: Paris Saint-Germain’s head coach Luis Enrique, centre-right, celebrates PSG’s French League One title after the League One football match between Paris Saint-Germain and Auxerre at the Parc des Princes stadium in Paris, on May 17, 2025 [Franck ...

title: Luis Enrique named as Paris Saint-Germain's new manager | Paris Saint-Germain
snippet: Paris Saint-Germain is delighted to announce that Luis Enrique has been named as its first team's new head coach, with the Spanish manager signing a two-year contract.
